==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=没事}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=méishì,er=y
|c=mut6 si6
|cat=intj,v
}}

===Interjection===
{{zh-interj}}

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[no problem]]; don't worry about it; that's OK; [[no worries]]

===Usage notes===
* Used colloquially to reply to someone who has just apologised to you or thanked you for something.

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to be [[OK]]; to be [[all right]]; to be out of [[danger]] or [[trouble]]
#: {{zh-x|你 沒事 嗎？|Are you '''OK'''?}}
#: {{zh-x|他 會 沒事 的。|He'll be '''all right'''.}}
# to have [[nothing]] to [[do]]; to be [[free]]
#: {{zh-x|我 天天 上班 沒事 幹{gàn}。|There's never anything for me to do at work.}}
